data.introduce:
自动废票服务是在线分销平台上的一个自动化操作环节的重要服务，提供销售环节的服务功能。  
自动废票服务(AirTicketVoid)提供的服务是：在航信在线分销平台上，根据客户请求，对已出票的PNR进行废票的功能，主要涉及到废票。
需要注意的是：
作废操作只能在出票当天使用， 并且在执行作废操作前必须保证所指定的打票机没有被其他的PID建控，
作废操作会自动对打票机进行建控卸控操作。
客票作废成功后，应注意将所订的PNR删除或者重新出票
data.business: 本接口实现自动废票的功能。
data.functions:
本版本支持的自动废票场景是：
非订单直接废票。
非订单BOP废票。
非订单AL本票废票。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirTicketVoidRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空作废电子客票请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"资源信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]},{"name":"@OtherID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"其他ID","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketVoidDetail","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"废票信息","children":[{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"订单号或PNR号信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"订单号或PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"类别","children":[]}]},{"name":"TicketItemInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号信息","children":[{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"@EndTicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"结束票号（联票）","children":[]}]},{"name":"IsBOP","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"BOP客票标识：当票证类型不填，BOP客票标识为true时，同样做BOP废票操作","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TicketType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票证类型：支持BSP、AL（本票）、BOP。若不填写，则按照BSP票处理。","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirTicketVoidRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空作废电子客票响应信息","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" Inner service error! ","msgZh":" 内部服务错误 "},{"code":" -1 ","name":null,"msg":" Biz Error ","msgZh":" 业务异常 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office permission denied ","msgZh":" Office无权限 "},{"code":" -390 ","name":null,"msg":" IBE Service Error ","msgZh":" IBE服务异常 "},{"code":" -402 ","name":null,"msg":" input error ","msgZh":" 输入错误 "},{"code":" -700 ","name":null,"msg":" office code is not valid ","msgZh":" office号格式错误 "},{"code":" -9999 ","name":null,"msg":" unknown error ","msgZh":" 未知错误 "},{"code":" -10060 ","name":null,"msg":" pnr does not exist ","msgZh":" pnr不存在 "},{"code":" -50011 ","name":null,"msg":" status of printer is not normal ","msgZh":" 打票机状态错误 "},{"code":" -50020 ","name":null,"msg":" status of ticket is not valid ","msgZh":" 客票状态错误 "},{"code":" -54100 ","name":null,"msg":" Host error: permisson denied ","msgZh":" 票号不存在或无法提取 "},{"code":" -60042 ","name":null,"msg":" fail to finish the transaction ","msgZh":" 操作失败 "}]

qaApiDemos.request:
？<OTA_AirTicketVoidRQ>
	<POS>
		<!-- PseudoCityCode = Office 号OtherID = 打票机号-->
		<Source PseudoCityCode="bjs187" OtherID="60"/>
	</POS>
	<!-- 票号,只有一个TicketVoidDetail 节点-->
	<TicketVoidDetail>
		<!-- pnr 号，必输-->
		<BookingReferenceID ID="HQRHX7" ID_Context="PNR"/>
		<!-- 票号，必输-->
		<TicketItemInfo TicketNumber="999-3944318760"/>
	</TicketVoidDetail>
</OTA_AirTicketVoidRQ>

<OTA_AirTicketVoidRQ TicketType="BOP">
    <POS>
        <!-- PseudoCityCode = Office 号OtherID = 打票机号-->
        <Source PseudoCityCode="SHA384" OtherID="9"/>
    </POS>
    <!-- 票号,只有一个TicketVoidDetail 节点-->
    <TicketVoidDetail>
        <!-- pnr 号，必输-->
        <BookingReferenceID ID="KEW0CM" ID_Context="PNR"/>
        <!-- 票号，必输-->
        <TicketItemInfo TicketNumber="988-4859960237"/>
    </TicketVoidDetail>
</OTA_AirTicketVoidRQ>

<OTA_AirTicketVoidRQ>
<POS>
<!-- PseudoCityCode = Office 号OtherID = 打票机号-->
<Source PseudoCityCode="bjs187" OtherID="60" />
</POS>
<!-- 票号,只有一个TicketVoidDetail 节点-->
<TicketVoidDetail>
<!-- pnr 号，必输-->
<BookingReferenceID ID="HQRHX7" ID_Context="PNR" />
<!-- 票号，必输-->
<TicketItemInfo TicketNumber="999-3944318760" />

<IsBOP>true</IsBOP>
</TicketVoidDetail>
</OTA_AirTicketVoidRQ>

<OTA_AirTicketVoidRQ TicketType="AL">
	<POS>
		<Source PseudoCityCode="PEK160" OtherID="1"/>
	</POS>
	<!-- 票号,只有一个TicketVoidDetail 节点-->
	<TicketVoidDetail>
		<!-- pnr 号，必输-->
		<BookingReferenceID ID="HNWXL0" ID_Context="PNR"/>
		<!-- 票号，必输-->
		<TicketItemInfo TicketNumber="160-2311529391" EndTicketNumber="160-2311529393"/>
	</TicketVoidDetail>
</OTA_AirTicketVoidRQ>
